branchCategory.name: 24VDC with IO-Link
branchCategory.description: <p>The JXCL1 is a single axis controller for the 24VDC step motors of LE series electric actuators.  This controller supports the IO-Link communication protocol.  When paired with an IO-Link master, it is possible to monitor status, reset alarms, set step data, and input motion controls directly from the PLC's HMI screen.  A full range of parameter settings are available.  IO-Link enables settings recovery when changing the controller for any reason.  JXCL1 incorporates IO-Link version 1.1 and com3 speed.</p>
